Saw it when it was on the Big screen n never forgot it. Review Title: Great Classic! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/05/29 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Frank Tashlin'], 'Producers': ['Harriet Parsons'], 'Starring': ['Dick Powell', 'Debbie Reynolds', 'Anne Francis'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: This movie is a cute one n delightful. Airy n lighthearted!~ Debbie Reynolds is ever amusing as she is pretty at heart, plus!~ A super-delightful movie that leaves you feeling uplifted!~ Review Title: A Happy Heart Movie!~ Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/05/29 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stanley Donen', 'Eugene Kelly'], 'Producers': ['Arthur Freed'], 'Starring': ['Eugene Kelly', "Donald O'Connor", 'Debbie Reynolds'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: A very very uplifting n happy movie with the three marvelous singin' n dancin' actors! Donald O'Connor is so limber n flexible in his moves n funny as can be in that "Make em Laugh" scene! He's very I'm using to watch! Kelly sings so smooth n his dancing is one of a kind~ It's always so great to watch him in that singin' in the rain review!~ Sweet n cute Debbie is at her best in that dancin' review with the rest of the girls wearing short pink outfits n throwing candy from the huge built in pocket on their hip~ Loved it!~ Light n airy!~ You always get well entertained from watching this movie!~ Review Title: A Feel Great Movie! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/07/03 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['ZinnemannFred'], 'Producers': ['Oscar Hammerstein II', 'Arthur Hornblow Jr.', 'Richard Rodgers'], 'Starring': ['Gordon Macrae', 'Gloria Grahame', 'Shirley Jones'], 'Studio': ['Classics']} Review Text: When I was a little girl in the mid-1950's, I recall when my grandmother took my mom n two sisters, and I, to see this picture in downtown LA, when it came out in 1955. It was a very delightful musical that we all enjoyed n a very good picture! If you like musicals, (which to say, I'm not a person who is very fond of them), this one you will honestly like~👍 I recommend one to see it. To me, it was the best "Oklahoma" picture made!~ Frankly,... I never forgot that nostalgic era n time when my wonderful grandma took us to see, "Oklahoma~" Great movie!~ Review Title: The Best Oklahoma Picture!~ Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/09/19 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Nathan Hertz'], 'Producers': ['Bernard Woolner'], 'Starring': ['Allison Hayes', 'William Hudson', 'Roy Gordon'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: Ay.. A typical 1950ish science-fiction story that's okay if you don't mind it being a smidge cheesey! ... All about a huge lady walking around wanting her husband Harry all to herself- lol!! Review Title: Big Lady! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/09/19 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Bulter'], 'Producers': ['William Jacobs'], 'Starring': ['Doris Day', 'Howard Keel', 'Allyn Ann McLerie'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: A-1 movie! Cute n sweet! Review Title: Entertaining!~ Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/10/06 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Burton'], 'Producers': ['Robert Shapiro', 'Richard Gilbert Abramson'], 'Starring': ['Pee-wee Herman', 'E. G. Daily', 'Mark Holton'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Review Text: Ridiculous movie! Review Title: Ridiculous Movie! Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/17 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Steven Spielberg'], 'Producers': ['George Eckstein'], 'Starring': ['Dennis Weaver', 'Jacqueline Scott', 'Eddie Firestone'], 'Studio': ['Universal Pictures']} Review Text: Action pact movie as usual!~ Seen movie a dozen times! A 'stepping stone'-'building up to,'.. suspenseful movie!~ ..HOWEVER!-
The sound quality is 'VERY POOR' each time I order a movie from Prime Video. They rev up the sound effects 'so sky-high loud' that you have to keep lowering the volume each time. But when they speak, you can 'barely hear' the actors speaking! Then you have to swing up the volume each time they talk!- You can hardly even hear them. And, I have the sound 'maxed out' to the highest level on my tv!- Amazon has a marvelous array of movies but they have got to try to improve the adjustment of their sound with these movies! Or,.. I've got to drop Prime Video and use another station. 'Think I'll let Amazon know soon concerning this "movie vs. sound"quality problem. "Duel" has always been a great movie~ You'll love it!!~ Review Title: Great Movie!!~ Bad/Poor Sound Quality!! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/17 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jerry Lewis'], 'Producers': ['Ernest D. Glucksman', 'Arthur P. Schmidt'], 'Starring': ['Sally Mansfield', 'Michael Landon', 'Brian Donlevy'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} Review Text: Funny/Hilarious movie! But, as with all their movies I rent from them, it's either: TOO high and TOO low soundtrack volume- 'Terrible! It's that way with most all of their movies!- 'NO FUN' watching them- Very disappointing indeed!--😕😒 Review Title: 🙌👌😆😀👍--->>>👎👎👎😠😕😯-->>😳 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/17 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español (Latinoamérica)'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]', 'Español'], 'Directors': ['Ken Annakin'], 'Producers': ['Bill Anderson'], 'Starring': ['John Mills', 'Dorothy McGuire', 'Kevin Corcoran'], 'Studio': ['Walt Disney Pictures']} Review Text: Great family movie!~👍😊 But poor quality sound on the movie!- TOO HIGH...TOO LOW quality!!!-👎😠 (SUPER LOUD on sound affects, SUPER LOW on actors speaking! Happens with all the movies I tried renting! Terrible!!...😧😡-----!!!👎 Review Title: Great Family Movie!~ Terrible Sound Quality!!!😡👎 Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/12/23 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Franklin J. Schaffner'], 'Producers': ['Arthur P. Jacobs'], 'Starring': ['Charlton Heston', 'Roddy McDowall', 'Kim Hunter'], 'Studio': ['20TH CENTURY FOX']} Review Text: Prime needs to really rearrange or regulate the video's audio soundtrack of their movies!!- 😟ROARS SO LOUD!!.. 😣😱when the sound affeçts come in, only to barely hear the words when they speak!!..😦 I'm sorry to say, little movies do I listen to in Prime anymore because of this poor regulating of their audio soundtracks. 😲 Always quickly having to lower the sound button so I don't blow my neighbors outa' bed!! 😵😵😵!! No foolin', Jack!! 😮My tenant got blown away😲 n asked me to please turn the sound down and I totally understood how they felt. I explained what was goin' on with this audio soundtrack that all of a sudden it barrels out loud 😵vs. barely hearing anyone in the picture speaking!!😮😶😥 Which,.. I had the sound 'maxed out' on the highest level 😱 just to hear them speaking!! 😠😞Also, you can get very tired😕😩 😴having to keep being a johnny-on-the-spot😇 monitoring the sound!😕 It's all pretty bad- bad-...BAD!!😤 PLEASE, PRIME!! DO SOMETHING ABOUT THIS ISSUE AND I'LL NOT BE BUYING SO MUCH FROM TUBI !!!- 😥Other then this,..you have an easy selection on just about all I could find in the way of good, new n older, movies!~😁😀😉 Review Title: Poorly Regulated-Audio Soundtrack!!! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/01/04 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Janson Media'], 'Producers': ['Dan Smith']} Review Text: Very interesting and enlightening about these 5 brothers who began from their back yard all the way to a Big Top. Unified and diversified these brothers were. They knew what it took to make their circus work! They got a strict upbringing from their folks which they used to put it to good use on making the Ringling Brothers Circus a success!~ It was very interesting n factful~ Review Title: An Extremely, Interesting Documetary!~ Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has consistently enjoyed a variety of films, expressing strong affection for classic and uplifting movies. They frequently mention delightful and entertaining experiences that many titles provide, highlighting enjoyable performances and nostalgic memories associated with family viewings. The user appreciates lighthearted and feel-good narratives, often rating these films highly. They express gratitude for the variety of good movies, noting specific actors' charm and talent, and describe their viewing experiences as uplifting, humorous, and entertaining. The positive sentiments revolve around the enjoyable and nostalgic aspects of films.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite the user’s love for films, they have voiced significant concerns regarding sound quality in streamed movies. Complaints focus on inconsistent audio levels, where sound effects are often too loud, making dialogue hard to understand. Many reviews express frustration with this recurring issue, stating that it detracts from the enjoyment of the movies, leading to disappointment and a potential reevaluation of their streaming choices. Terms like “terrible” and “bad” are used to describe the sound experience, from overpowering effects to barely audible dialogue, indicating a serious concern for the user.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user exhibits a strong fondness for classic and uplifting films, frequently highlighting positive viewing experiences and memorable performances that resonate with nostalgia. While they appreciate the variety and quality of content, persistent issues with sound quality in streaming services overshadow their enjoyment, leading to frustration and disappointment. The dual focus on enjoying engaging narratives while grappling with technical shortcomings reflects a nuanced relationship with their movie-watching experiences, balancing joy with the challenges presented by audio problems.

target_interaction.title: Good Movie~👌
target_interaction.text: ‘Seen it several times before~ Very good👌 If you like suspense you’ll not be disappointed!~ You need to see this one!~
